vimshottari.name: Vimshottari Dasha
vimshottari.description: Vimshottari Dasha is the most widely used dasha system in Vedic astrology. It is based on the Moon's Nakshatra at birth and follows a 120-year cycle. Each planet rules a specific period (Mahadasha), which is further divided into sub-periods (Antardasha).

Ketu.general: Spiritual awakening, detachment, sudden changes, research, occult interests
Ketu.positive: Moksha, enlightenment, healing abilities, past life wisdom
Ketu.negative: Confusion, losses, health issues, accidents, separation

Venus.general: Love, marriage, luxury, arts, vehicles, comforts, wealth
Venus.positive: Romance, creativity, financial gains, beautiful possessions

Sun.general: Authority, government, father, leadership, health, vitality
Sun.negative: Ego clashes, health issues, conflicts with authority

Moon.general: Mind, emotions, mother, public, travel, liquids, nursing
Moon.positive: Mental peace, public popularity, emotional fulfillment
Moon.negative: Mental stress, mood swings, domestic issues

Mars.general: Energy, courage, property, siblings, surgery, accidents
Mars.positive: Victory over enemies, property gains, courage, sports
Mars.negative: Anger, accidents, surgery, conflicts, blood disorders

Rahu.general: Foreign travel, unconventional, technology, obsessions, illusions
Rahu.positive: Foreign connections, technology success, material gains

Jupiter.general: Wisdom, children, religion, wealth, teachers, expansion
Jupiter.positive: Spiritual growth, children, wealth, higher education
Jupiter.negative: Weight gain, liver issues, over-optimism, legal issues

Saturn.general: Discipline, delays, karma, hard work, longevity, servants
Saturn.positive: Recognition through hard work, discipline, property
Saturn.negative: Delays, obstacles, chronic illness, depression, losses

Mercury.negative: Nervous disorders, speech issues, business losses
